pageContext.claim: “The Washington Post is constantly quoting 'anonymous sources' that do not exist. Rarely do they use the name of anyone because there is no one to give them the kind of negative quote that they are looking for. They are a disgrace to journalism but then again, so are many others!”
pageContext.analysis: The Post does not make up sources and as a matter of course runs its reporting by the White House to seek comment before publication.
